name: Peachy
description: A protein tracker to stay on course with your fitness goals. Set a goal, add the food you eat throughout the day and keep track of your protein intake.
features: Goal based daily protein intake progress
Stats (daily avg., per meal avg., streak)

name: Shika
description: A mobile client for AniList to keep track of your favorite animes. Easily keep an eye on your current progress of the animes your are watching, browse through a large collection of upcoming animes, classics and fan favorites. Add the ones that catch your attention to your watchlist
features: Currently watching, planning to watch and completed animes
Browse animes with search and filters

name: Trivia world
description: A fun trivia game to test your knowledge in different areas made with Kotlin Multiplatform.
tech: KotlinMultiplatform - Jetpack Compose - MVVM - Coroutines - Koin

name: AroundMe weather
description: A simple weather app for Android, powered by the OpenWeatherMap API.
features: Display weather data arround current location
Search and fetch weather data for a different city
Weather details with hourly forecast for selected location
